Big news from @NEFarmBureau ! Their 2020 report notes that #Nebraska remains the 5th-largest ag exporting state, topping the nation in #beef exports, while being the second largest exporter of hides and skins. Honored to lead the Beef Caucus in Congress.

A new @ICEgov report shows deportations down 70% from 2020, the lowest in five years. That's an average of just 100 deportations a day, even as border patrol agents encountered up to 7,000 illegal immigrants a day. Charity cannot flow from border chaos. @CBP #BorderCrisis

The Bureau of Labor Statistics released another alarming inflation report yesterday showing consumer #prices in January rose 7.5% over the year. #Inflation outpaces wage growth once again with real hourly earnings falling 1.7% over the year and real weekly earnings falling 3.1%. https://t.co/oqEJJr8nGg
